glsa.title: Nessus: "adduser" race condition vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Nessus contains a vulnerability allowing a user to perform a privilege escalation attack.

background.p: Nessus is a free and powerful network security scanner.

description.p: A race condition can occur in "nessus-adduser" if the user has not configured their TMPDIR variable.

impact.p: A malicious user could exploit this bug to escalate privileges to the rights of the user running "nessus-adduser".

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version of Nessus.
